rulesStrings.li: questDescription(askerIsNull==True)->Your radio lights up with another request for E352. The automated satellite ominously claims that this will be your final assignment. The voice tells you about an important piece of technology. The most legendary component to the supersolider program, a device called the archite pathing array. It is meant to manipulate the unpredictable flow of archovapor, potentially doubling your returns. The voice tells you to reach the vault and recover the technology, not stating a clear reason why.\n\nOur objective is to clear the laboratory, and claim the archite pathing array. It can be inferred that there will be hostile forces swarming the site.
